name: 3dDTtoDWI
author: AFNI Developers
description: Tool to compute multiple gradient images from tensors and gradient vector coordinates applied to the I0-dataset.

inputs.name: Gradient File
inputs.description: 1D file containing the gradient vectors (ASCII floats) for non-zero gradients.

inputs.name: DT Dataset
inputs.description: 6-sub-brick dataset containing the diffusion tensor data (Dxx, Dxy, Dyy, Dxz, Dyz, Dzz).

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: Prefix for the output dataset name.

inputs.name: Automask
inputs.description: Compute gradient images only for high-intensity (brain) voxels.

inputs.name: Output Data Type
inputs.description: Type of the output dataset (float, short, or byte).

output-files.name: Output DWI Dataset
output-files.description: Computed DWI images including sub-brick for each gradient vector.
